Package com.petfoster.services

Class PetService

java.lang.Object
com.petfoster.services.PetService
@Service public class PetService extends Object
Service class for managing pets and their related operations.

      a list of PetDTO objects representing all pets

    • addNewPet

      public PetDTO addNewPet(Long userId, PetDTO petDto, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile imageFile) throws IOException
      Adds a new pet with the specified details and image file.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user adding the pet
      petDto - the pet data transfer object containing pet details
      imageFile - the image file of the pet
      Returns:
      a PetDTO object representing the added pet
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while processing the image file

    • updatePet

      Updates the details of an existing pet.
      Parameters:
      id - the pet ID
      petDTO - the pet data transfer object containing updated pet details
      Returns:
      a PetDTO object representing the updated pet
